## Source: ossf-package-analysis (63e8c653b0b0803846b580b6f51ca35ae56cbd41dc67055bcb4121fae2628cb8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'old-header-parser' @ 90.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
